title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 490.6 - Personal or domestic service (unemployment insurance law, section 560, subd. 1)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 490.6 - Personal or domestic service (unemployment insurance law, section 560, subd. 1)

State Regulations

The term persons employed in personal or domestic service
in private homes shall include all persons employed by an employer in his
capacity as a house holder, as distinguished from persons employed by the
employer in the pursuit of a trade, occupation, profession, enterprise, or
avocation. Notes

490.6
